message.entry: Function imlincomb expected its array input arguments (A1, A2, ...) to have the same class.
Function imlincomb expected its array input arguments (A1, A2, ...) to be the same size.
Function imlincomb expected its array input arguments (A1, A2, ...) to be numeric or logical, real, and full.
Expected images A1, A2, ... to have the same size.
Expected images A1, A2, ... to be of the same type.
Code generation supports a maximum of 4 array input arguments.
